abstract: Speaking to the especially wired group of executives and politicians at Google’s Zeitgeist conference, Yves Chouinard, the founder of the Patagonia outdoor clothing maker, said he has never used a keyboard and that technology tends to homogenize culture.
snippet: Speaking to the especially wired group of executives and politicians at Google’s Zeitgeist conference, Yves Chouinard, the founder of the Patagonia outdoor clothing maker, said he has never used a keyboard and that technology tends to homogenize c...
lead_paragraph: At its two-day Zeitgeist conference, which ended Thursday, Google assembled business and political leaders, a crowd that spends much of its day staring at small screens and being broadcast over big ones.

abstract: Eric Schmidt, the chief executive of Google, said the company plans to use the social information implicit in Gmail and its other services to improve its search engine.
snippet: Eric Schmidt, the chief executive of Google, said the company plans to use the social information implicit in Gmail and its other services to improve its search engine.
lead_paragraph: Just days ago, Steve Ballmer, Microsoft’s chief executive, was warning that social networking may be a fad.

headline.main: Google Gives Some Hints About Social Network Plan
